sn45.48:4.2: “Sace vo, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyā paribbājakā evaṃ puccheyyuṃ:
sn45.48:4.3: ‘kimatthiyaṃ, āvuso, samaṇe gotame brahmacariyaṃ vussatī’ti, evaṃ puṭṭhā tumhe, bhikkhave, tesaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ evaṃ byākareyyātha:
sn45.48:4.5: Sace pana vo, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyā paribbājakā evaṃ puccheyyuṃ:
sn45.48:4.6: ‘atthi panāvuso, maggo, atthi paṭipadā anupādāparinibbānāyā’ti, evaṃ puṭṭhā tumhe, bhikkhave, tesaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ evaṃ byākareyyātha:
sn45.48:4.7: ‘atthi kho, āvuso, maggo, atthi paṭipadā anupādāparinibbānāyā’ti.
sn45.48:4.8: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, maggo, katamā ca paṭipadā anupādāparinibbānāya?
sn45.48:4.12: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, maggo, ayaṃ paṭipadā anupādāparinibbānāyāti.
sn45.48:4.13: Evaṃ puṭṭhā tumhe, bhikkhave, tesaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ evaṃ byākareyyāthā”ti.
